short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: automates kudosing on a popular fitness social media platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of pressing Kudos on your friend's fitness activities one button at a time? Look no further! This extension will click the Kudos button on all activities which are loaded into your browser. Enjoy!
